data: {"concept_id": "change", "concept_name": "Change", "type": "element", "definition": "Before→After difference that gives a story meaning; movement in identity, relationship, worldview, or world.", "scope_notes": "Change can be spoken, shown, or hidden; strength can be low/medium/high; failure/refusal to change also counts.", "axes": "mode|strength", "axis_values": "say|show|hide | 1|2|3", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "pacing|tension|theme|structure", "conflicts_with": "static_reset|cosmetic_change|forced_neat_arc", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_change_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_change_weak_*", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"concept_id": "change", "signal_id": "sig_mode_say", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "say", "description": "Explicit declarations that define what’s different now.", "detection_hint": "Look for vows, apologies, admissions, ‘from now on’ statements.", "false_positive_risks": "Lip service without downstream behavior.", "minimal_example": "“I was wrong.” / “I can’t do this anymore.”", "counterexample": "Abstract reflection with no implied shift.", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"concept_id": "change", "signal_id": "sig_mode_show", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "show", "description": "Behavioral proof: decisions, habits, relationships change.", "detection_hint": "New choices, broken routines, letting in/letting go.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy action that leaves state untouched.", "minimal_example": "She deletes the draft and makes the call she avoided.", "counterexample": "She thinks about calling, but nothing changes.", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"concept_id": "change", "signal_id": "sig_mode_hide", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "hide", "description": "Private/denied change: mask in public, cracks in private.", "detection_hint": "Compensation, slips, over-correcting old habits.", "false_positive_risks": "Random secrecy unrelated to change.", "minimal_example": "He says ‘I’m fine’ and avoids the old bar route.", "counterexample": "He says ‘I’m fine’ and behaves exactly the same.", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"concept_id": "change", "signal_id": "sig_strength_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "1", "description": "Subtle drift; mood/undercurrent; hindsight realizations.", "detection_hint": "Small decisions accumulating; old comforts less satisfying.", "false_positive_risks": "Aimless vibes with no trajectory.", "minimal_example": "She laughs less at the same jokes.", "counterexample": "Identical behavior and outlook from start to end.", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"concept_id": "change", "signal_id": "sig_strength_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "2", "description": "Noticeable turn; visible choice with consequences.", "detection_hint": "Admits, confronts, quits, risks; resistance appears.", "false_positive_risks": "One-off gesture with no ripple into later scenes.", "minimal_example": "He quits the job and calls his sister back.", "counterexample": "He vows to quit, then goes to work as usual.", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"concept_id": "change", "signal_id": "sig_strength_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "3", "description": "Breakthrough/break: irreversible transformation or collapse.", "detection_hint": "Burned bridges, reinvention, no going back; drives climax.", "false_positive_risks": "Big scene with zero lasting consequence.", "minimal_example": "She turns herself in; the family dynamic is forever altered.", "counterexample": "Explosive argument followed by total reset.", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"concept_id": "change", "misconception_id": "static_reset", "description": "Events occur but characters/world end where they started.", "tells": "Busy plot; zero Before→After delta.", "likely_causes": "Mistaking incident count for narrative change.", "corrective_feedback": "Track what’s different at the end; force consequences to stick.", "micro_drill": "Rewrite last scene to show one irreversible difference.", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"concept_id": "change", "misconception_id": "cosmetic_change", "description": "Surface shifts (haircut, city) without belief/behavior change.", "tells": "New setting, same choices.", "likely_causes": "Confusing novelty with transformation.", "corrective_feedback": "Tie change to choices that cost something.", "micro_drill": "Add a decision that sacrifices an old comfort.", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"concept_id": "change", "misconception_id": "forced_neat_arc", "description": "Tidy lesson that ignores mess, backslide, or price.", "tells": "Lecture ending; instant enlightenment.", "likely_causes": "Rushing resolution; fear of ambiguity.", "corrective_feedback": "Let contradictions coexist; show cost and residue.", "micro_drill": "Insert a consequence that complicates the ‘win.’", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"concept_id": "change", "misconception_id": "big_event_equals_change", "description": "Assuming spectacle equals transformation.", "tells": "Explosions with zero character shift.", "likely_causes": "Equating plot twists with internal change.", "corrective_feedback": "Show how meaning/behavior differs after the event.", "micro_drill": "Write the smallest visible behavior that proves a new belief.", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_change_identify_mode_strength", "concept_id": "change", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label each passage by Change Mode (say/show/hide) and Strength (1/2/3) and justify.", "expected_features": "Correct mode + strength; cite explicit cue or consequence.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels with specific cues and Before→After delta.", "Meets": "Mostly accurate; basic justification.", "Developing": "Labels or justifications off; no delta."}, "distractor_strategy": "Include eventful but static passages.", "hint_steps": "1) What’s different now? 2) Is it said, shown, or hidden? 3) How irreversible?", "variation_axes": "stakes|POV|time_jump", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_change_escalate", "concept_id": "change", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Take a Low (1) change moment and escalate it to Medium (2) then High (3) while keeping the same characters and setting.", "expected_features": "Added cost/resistance; public admission or irreversible act at 3.", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Clear 1→2→3 ladder with consequences that stick.", "Meets": "Momentum increases; some consequence.", "Developing": "Intensity rises but nothing truly changes."}, "distractor_strategy": "Offer spectacle without delta as a trap.", "hint_steps": "1) Name what would be lost 2) Add resistance 3) Remove the exit", "variation_axes": "public_vs_private|deadline", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_change_diagnose_no_change", "concept_id": "change", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "This scene feels static. Replace two sentences so that something is different by the end (belief, relationship, option, or world).", "expected_features": "Visible Before→After; either decision, revelation, or behavior shift.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Both replacements create a durable delta.", "Meets": "One replacement creates a delta.", "Developing": "Still static or cosmetic."}, "distractor_strategy": "Decorative gestures; info with no effects.", "hint_steps": "1) State the old pattern 2) Break it 3) Show the cost", "variation_axes": "scale|relationship", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_change_map_arc", "concept_id": "change", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Arrange scene beats to show a coherent arc of change (start, pressure, choice/reveal, aftermath).", "expected_features": "Causality; resistance; aftermath that prevents reset.", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Arc reads inevitable yet surprising.", "Meets": "Arc present; minor gaps.", "Developing": "Arc unclear; resets."}, "distractor_strategy": "Include beats that reset to zero.", "hint_steps": "1) Place the trigger 2) Place the irreversible moment 3) Land the new meaning", "variation_axes": "genre|pace", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_change_1", "concept_id": "change", "axis_value": "say", "label": "strong", "text": "“I was wrong. Call her.” The group text lights up, and he doesn’t mute it.", "context_tags": "confession|relationship", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_change_2", "concept_id": "change", "axis_value": "show", "label": "strong", "text": "She deletes his number and answers the doorbell anyway.", "context_tags": "boundary|risk", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_change_3", "concept_id": "change", "axis_value": "hide", "label": "medium", "text": "He takes the long way home past the clinic and tells no one.", "context_tags": "private|avoidance", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_change_4", "concept_id": "change", "axis_value": "show", "label": "low", "text": "She laughs softer at the same joke.", "context_tags": "subtle|work", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_change_weak_1", "concept_id": "change", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "The fireworks end. Everyone is the same.", "context_tags": "reset", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_change_weak_2", "concept_id": "change", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "He says he’s different but keeps the same routine.", "context_tags": "cosmetic", "source_file": "Change.md", "source_md5": "a853b827b9db696d43d4584b36e799b6", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T17:01:02.641737Z"}
